Class Segment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Segment

  • class Segment
extends java.lang.Object
    Segment Class Specifies Video Segments. Considering 90 Sec Video, We make Segments of size 10% of the Total Video.
    Author:
    Damini Singh, Rudresh Ajgaonkar Variables : segId - Specifies Unique Id for a Segment averageNoOfObjects - Specifies Assigned Max Number Of Objects per Segment.
